languages.text: "Ограниченность разума и простота души... Каждый день я словно в западне, окруженная стаей диких животных". {n}Прикрыв глаза, она едва слышно добавляет:{/n} "Я готова заплатить эту цену ради того, чтобы отыскать собратьев. Но всему есть предел".

"Narrow minds and simple souls... Every day, I feel as if I am caught in a trap, surrounded by a pack of wild animals." {n}Half-closing her eyes, she adds, her words barely audible,{/n} "I am prepared to pay this price to find my kin. But everything has its limit."
languages.original_text: "Ограниченность разума и простота души... Каждый день я словно в западне, окруженная стаей диких животных". {n}Прикрыв глаза, она едва слышно добавляет:{/n} "Я готова заплатить эту цену ради того, чтобы отыскать собратьев. Но всему есть предел".

traits.locale_text: "The simplicity of soul and narrow-mindedness... Every day, I feel like I'm trapped by a pack of wild animals." {n}Half-closing her eyes, she adds, her words barely audible:{/n} "I'm prepared to pay this price to find my kinsmen. But everything has its limits."

"The simplicity of soul and narrow-mindedness... Every day, I feel like I'm trapped by a pack of wild animals." {n}Half-closing her eyes, she adds, her words barely audible:{/n} "I'm prepared to pay this price to find my kinsmen. But everything has its limits."

"Narrow minds and simple souls... Every day, I feel as if I am caught in a trap, surrounded by a pack of wild animals." {n}Half-closing her eyes, she adds, her words barely audible,{/n} "I am prepared to pay this price to find my kin. But everything has its limit."

"Narrow minds and simple souls... Every day, I feel as if I am caught in a trap, surrounded by a pack of wild animals." {n}Half-closing her eyes, she adds, her words barely audible,{/n} "I am prepared to pay this price to find my kin. But everything has its limit."

languages.text: “狭隘的思想，简陋的灵魂……每一天，我都感觉自己深陷野兽环伺的陷阱之中。”{n}伊莉耶特半眯着眼睛，以几不可察的声音补充道，{/n}“为了我的族人的一线生机……我愿意忍耐这些事情，可我的忍耐也是有极限的。”
languages.original_text: "Narrow minds and simple souls... Every day, I feel as if I am caught in a trap, surrounded by a pack of wild animals." {n}Half-closing her eyes, she adds, her words barely audible,{/n} "I am prepared to pay this price to find my kin. But everything has its limit."

traits.locale_text: “狭隘的思想，简陋的灵魂……每一天，我都感觉自己深陷野兽环伺的陷阱之中。”{n}伊莉耶特半眯着眼睛，以几不可察的声音补充道，{/n}“为了我的族人的一线生机……我愿意忍耐这些事情，可我的忍耐也是有极限的。”

languages.text: «Mentes intolerantes y almas simples... Cada día me siento como si estuviese atrapada por un cepo y rodeada por una jauría de fieras». {n}Yrliet entrecierra los ojos y masculla entre dientes:{/n} «Estoy dispuesta a pagar este precio con tal de encontrar a mi gente. Pero todo tiene un límite».
languages.original_text: "Narrow minds and simple souls... Every day, I feel as if I am caught in a trap, surrounded by a pack of wild animals." {n}Half-closing her eyes, she adds, her words barely audible,{/n} "I am prepared to pay this price to find my kin. But everything has its limit."

traits.locale_text: «Mentes intolerantes y almas simples... Cada día me siento como si estuviese atrapada por un cepo y rodeada por una jauría de fieras». {n}Yrliet entrecierra los ojos y masculla entre dientes:{/n} «Estoy dispuesta a pagar este precio con tal de encontrar a mi gente. Pero todo tiene un límite».

languages.text: « Des esprits étroits et des âmes primitives... Chaque jour, j'ai l'impression d'être tombée dans un piège, entourée par une meute d'animaux sauvages. » {n}Elle ferme les yeux à moitié et ajoute dans un murmure :{/n} « Je suis prête à me sacrifier pour retrouver mon peuple, mais j'ai tout de même des limites. »
languages.original_text: "Narrow minds and simple souls... Every day, I feel as if I am caught in a trap, surrounded by a pack of wild animals." {n}Half-closing her eyes, she adds, her words barely audible,{/n} "I am prepared to pay this price to find my kin. But everything has its limit."

traits.locale_text: « Des esprits étroits et des âmes primitives... Chaque jour, j'ai l'impression d'être tombée dans un piège, entourée par une meute d'animaux sauvages. » {n}Elle ferme les yeux à moitié et ajoute dans un murmure :{/n} « Je suis prête à me sacrifier pour retrouver mon peuple, mais j'ai tout de même des limites. »

languages.text: "Schmaler Verstand und einfaches Gemüt ... Ich fühle mich jeden Tag wie in einer Falle gefangen, umgeben von einem Rudel wilder Tiere." {n}Mit halb geschlossenen Augen fährt sie kaum hörbar fort:{/n} "Ich bin bereit, diesen Preis zu bezahlen, um meine Leute zu finden. Aber alles hat Grenzen."
languages.original_text: "Narrow minds and simple souls... Every day, I feel as if I am caught in a trap, surrounded by a pack of wild animals." {n}Half-closing her eyes, she adds, her words barely audible,{/n} "I am prepared to pay this price to find my kin. But everything has its limit."

traits.locale_text: "Schmaler Verstand und einfaches Gemüt ... Ich fühle mich jeden Tag wie in einer Falle gefangen, umgeben von einem Rudel wilder Tiere." {n}Mit halb geschlossenen Augen fährt sie kaum hörbar fort:{/n} "Ich bin bereit, diesen Preis zu bezahlen, um meine Leute zu finden. Aber alles hat Grenzen."

languages.text: 「頭が固く、単純な魂…我は毎日、野獣の群れに囲まれた中で罠にかかっているような気分だ」{n}半ば目を閉じ、かろうじて聞き取れるような声で、彼女は付け加える。{/n}「同族を見つけるためなら、この代償を払う覚悟はできている。だが、何事にも限度というものがある」
languages.original_text: "Narrow minds and simple souls... Every day, I feel as if I am caught in a trap, surrounded by a pack of wild animals." {n}Half-closing her eyes, she adds, her words barely audible,{/n} "I am prepared to pay this price to find my kin. But everything has its limit."

traits.locale_text: 「頭が固く、単純な魂…我は毎日、野獣の群れに囲まれた中で罠にかかっているような気分だ」{n}半ば目を閉じ、かろうじて聞き取れるような声で、彼女は付け加える。{/n}「同族を見つけるためなら、この代償を払う覚悟はできている。だが、何事にも限度というものがある」

languages.original_text: "Narrow minds and simple souls... Every day, I feel as if I am caught in a trap, surrounded by a pack of wild animals." {n}Half-closing her eyes, she adds, her words barely audible,{/n} "I am prepared to pay this price to find my kin. But everything has its limit."

languages.text: "Dar bir bakış açısı ve ucuz ruhlar... Her gün kendimi tuzağa düşmüş, etrafım vahşi hayvanlarla çevrilmiş gibi hissediyorum." {n}Gözlerini kısarak zar zor duyulan birkaç kelime daha söylüyor.{/n} "Soyumu bulmak için bu bedeli ödemeye hazırım. Fakat her şeyin bir sınırı var."
languages.original_text: "Narrow minds and simple souls... Every day, I feel as if I am caught in a trap, surrounded by a pack of wild animals." {n}Half-closing her eyes, she adds, her words barely audible,{/n} "I am prepared to pay this price to find my kin. But everything has its limit."

traits.locale_text: "Dar bir bakış açısı ve ucuz ruhlar... Her gün kendimi bir tuzağa düşmüş, etrafım vahşi hayvanlarla çevrilmiş gibi hissediyorum." {n}Gözlerini kısarak zar zor duyulan birkaç kelime daha söylüyor.{/n} "Soyumu bulmak için bu bedeli ödemeye hazırım. Fakat her şeyin bir sınırı vardır."
